text:
We should have a template structural image that can be used as a background in examples. One suggestion is to put it in the `nilearn_data` directory, except if we are afraid the end user removes that directory in order to manually clean the cached data.

Once it is done, the examples should be updated.

Although this change may be scheduled, I think it is good to have an open issue as a reminder.
title: Cosmetic: Default structural image to put as a background in examples
Cosmetic: Default structural image to put as a background in examples

text:
> Although this change may be scheduled, I think it is good to have an
> open issue as a reminder.

This will happen in September, when Loic joins us and works on
visualization. In the mean time, we focus on algorithms.
Can we consider this one solved by the new plotting functions?
